ai-iti48:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti48:2.1_0: “Mendicants, two kinds of people are bound for a place of loss, bound for hell, if they don’t give up this fault.
ai-iti48:2.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by two?
ai-iti48:2.3_0: One who lives the spiritual life in purity is impure,
ai-iti48:2.4_0: These are the two kinds of people bound for a place of loss, bound for hell, if they don’t give up this fault.”
ai-iti48:2.5_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti48:3.1_0: “He who speaks what is untrue goes to the nether regions,
ai-iti48:3.2_0: as does one who denies what they did.
ai-iti48:3.3_0: Both are equal in the hereafter,
ai-iti48:3.4_0: Are the same when they transmigration,
ai-iti48:4.3_0: Being wicked, they are reborn in hell
ai-iti48:5.1_0: It’d be better for the immoral and unrestrained
ai-iti48:5.4_0: than to eat the nation’s alms.”
ai-iti48:6.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
